Hush Point
Basso Basso Basso - bass clarinet bass clarinet and bass

EP tracked and coming out soon!. 

Patrick Breiner - bass clarinet
Alec Spiegelman - bass clarient
Aryeh Kobrinsky - bass

Solo Shmolo - documentation of my exploration in tuning in 5ths

In 2016, I made the switch to tuning my bass in 5ths. Solo Shmolo is an ongoing project of presenting, documenting, recording the new sounds and techniques that have developed from the switch. 

Brinsk - acoustic metal quintet

My debut project and album from long ago:
Jacob Wick - trumpet
Evan Smith - saxophone
Adam Dotson - euphonium
Aryeh Kobrinsky - bass

Perfect Friend - Destination Wedding

Cody Brown - drums
